title: ESSENTIAL OILS — Shrout Family Chiropractic Carmel Chiropractor
description: This is where you can learn about and sign up for Young Living Oils. You can run your Young Living oils like a business or you can just benefit from buying the oils and lifestyle products to detoxify your home and remove chemicals from your life.
cleaned_text: Click [here](https://www.youngliving.com/vo/#/signup/new-start?sponsorid=1317573&enrollerid=1317573&isocountrycode=US&culture=en-US&type=member) to be directed to the Young Living sign up page. We will contact you when you sign up to answer any questions you may have and to help get you started. Unlike other multi level marketing companies, there is no monthly commitment or requirement with Young Living unless you are starting it as a business. We highly recommend enrolling in Essential Rewards, which is detailed below. Whether you are just interested in buying the products to help your household be less toxic, or you are wanting to start a business, we are here to help so please contact us with any questions. And if you signed up, Congratulations on taking the the first step to a healthier and less toxic life! We are fervent supporters of everything these oils have to offer. Aromatherapy is a time tested practice, but these oils don't just stop there. Most of the them can be diffused, applied topically, or even ingested as a supplement. Young Living also has dietary supplements and essential oil blends used for specific purposes as well as cleaning supplies, personal care items, and diffusers and other accessories. Click [here](https://www.youngliving.com/en_US/products) to be directed to the Young Living product page for more information. You can also use our contact page in order to ask us any questions you have about individual oils or supplements and what they are used for. You can purchase some of these products and oils on our Shop page (coming soon!). You can also contact [here](/contact) about signing up for a Young Living Distributorship and get the products at wholesale cost or you can click [here](https://www.youngliving.com/vo/#/signup/new-start?sponsorid=1317573&enrollerid=1317573&isocountrycode=US&culture=en-US&type=member) to be directed to our sign up page. There are no minimum orders per month, so you can just order them when you need them. Or you can start your own oils business and start making money on it. Your level of commitment is entirely up to you. Please feel free to use the contact page with any questions about specific oils and their benefits, or questions about becoming a member to get the oils at the discounted rate. You'll find that you quickly become an expert and you will not leave your house without a pocket/purse full of little
